content.name: mgmtInterface
content.description: Information about management interfaces in the storage system.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the mgmtInterface instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the mgmtInterface instance.

attributes.name: ethernetPort
attributes.description: Ethernet port on the storage processor on which the interface is running.

attributes.name: ipAddress
attributes.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address for the interface.

attributes.name: v6PrefixLength
attributes.description: IPv6 prefix length for the interface, if the interface uses an IPv6 address.

attributes.name: netmask
attributes.description: IPv4 netmask for the interface, if the interface uses an IPv4 address.
